thread.section_title: Hotel Britannique - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wondeful Hotel in Heart of Paris
thread.title_full: Wondeful Hotel in Heart of Paris - Review of Hotel Britannique, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maria D
title: Wondeful Hotel in Heart of Paris
text: We stayed at the Hotel Britannique for 4 days in March 2017. Our stay was wonderful. The hotel is beautiful, with comfortable beds, and friendly, helpful staff. Best of all, it is very close to a metro stop, Notre Dame, the Louvre, the Seine, Sainte Chapelle, etc. We highly recommend Hotel Brittanique.
